name: types
brief:
Core type definitions and index set infrastructure for Gravity

Foundational enums and classes for the Gravity modeling language.

**Convexity Tracking:**
- Convexity: linear_, convex_, concave_, undet_
- Sign: neg_, non_pos_, zero_, non_neg_, pos_, unknown_
- Enables automatic convexity detection in expressions

**Function Classification:**
- FType: const_, lin_, quad_, pol_, nlin_ (constraint complexity)
- MType: lin_m, quad_m, pol_m, nlin_m (model type)
- OperatorType: All mathematical operations (+, -, *, /, ^, sin, cos, etc.)

**Index Set System (indices class):**
- Defines sets over which variables/constraints are declared
- Supports: ordered pairs, time expansion, matrix indexing
- Operations: union, combine, exclude, filter
- Used for: "for all i in Nodes, j in Arcs" style modeling

**Space Types:**
- R: Real numbers (R^n)
- R_p: Positive reals
- C: Complex numbers
see: gravity/var.h for variable declarations over indices
gravity/constraint.h for constraints over index sets
